name: Mystical Magica: Into the Verdant Greens
name_original: Mystical Magica: Into the Verdant Greens
description:
Venture into the mushroom-infested forest and fight creatures that come your way!

Controls:

a, d - move left, right

space - jump

left click - basic attack

right click - heavy attack

Credits:

Team Lead: Ben Wargowski

Artists: Natalia Batista, Franklin Feng, Nicholas Lum, Yeeun Min

Game Designers: Ben Wargowski, Aidan Whitlock

Programmers: Rameez Aslam, Joseph Cha, Ethan Madjus, Skylar Lee-Stefanov

Level Audio - Jadon Ark (JadDoggy)

Main Menu Audio - Anonymous

Producer: Ethan Madjus
